meanings.definition: Feeling or showing suspicion or distrust
meanings.sent1: She gave him the leeriest look when he offered to help.
meanings.sent2: The detective was always the leeriest when meeting new suspects.
meanings.sent3: The cat gave the leeriest glance at the new dog in the house.
meanings.sent4: His leeriest expression made everyone wonder what he was hiding.
meanings.sent5: The leeriest expression on her face made it clear she didn't trust him.

meanings.sent1: He took the leeriest approach when entering the dark cave.
meanings.sent2: The leeriest hiker always checked the trail before proceeding.
meanings.sent3: The leeriest squirrel cautiously approached the new bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: The leeriest driver navigated the icy roads with extreme caution.
meanings.sent5: The leeriest student double-checked all the answers before submitting the test.

meanings.sent1: She was the leeriest to try the exotic food at the party.
meanings.sent2: The leeriest employee hesitated before accepting the promotion.
meanings.sent3: The leeriest child reluctantly joined the game with the other kids.
meanings.sent4: He was the leeriest to jump into the cold pool on a winter day.
meanings.sent5: The leeriest shopper took a long time to decide on which dress to buy.
